main_definition: referring to the period of time that something happens or exists, often in relation to another event or time frame.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the context of time span
meanings_and_examples.example: During the concert, I met my old friend.

meanings_and_examples.definition: While an action is taking place
meanings_and_examples.example: During her workout, she drank plenty of water to stay hydrated.

meanings_and_examples.definition: In the midst of a particular situation or condition
meanings_and_examples.example: The team continued working on their project during the lunch break.
During rush hour, it can be challenging to find parking in the city center.
